titles: The first parte, of the eyghth liberall science: entituled, Ars adulandi, the arte of flatterie with the confutation therof, both very pleasaunt and profitable, deuised and compiled, by Vlpian Fulwell.
author: Fulwell, Ulpian, fl. 1586.
publisher: By [William How for] Richarde Iones, and are to bee solde at his shoppe ouer agaynst Sainct Sepulchers Churche,
notes: Actual printer's name and publication date from STC.
A variant of the edition with year "1579" in the imprint--Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Courts and courtiers --  Early works to 1800.
